live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
32763.summary: Some customers in Fort St. John (East) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
32763.title: Jan 29 - Fort St. John (East) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
